amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part D of House Report 118-115 to ensure that the Secretary notifies employers of the availability of tax-advantaged flexible health insurance benefits, with an official focus on small businesses, particularly in rural areas.
amendment.purpose: Amendment ensures that the Secretary notifies employers of the availability of tax-advantaged flexible health insurance benefits, with an official focus on small businesses, particularly in rural areas.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Molinaro amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 281 - 151 (Roll no. 279).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Molinaro.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Molinaro amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 281 - 151 (Roll no. 279).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
